website_summaries.verdict: At around 15 pounds and easy to fold, it's an attractive option for parents who need a portable seat. But it's not practical for everyone.
pros: A lightweight, compact chair that can be folded to a compact size
Has a carrying handle and an adjustable tray that swings for easy access and cleaning
cons: Pricier than others on our list
Feels a bit wobbly when used by active kids
Seat is too spacious for small kids, making it difficult for them to sit upright

customer_reviews.title: NOT Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this high chair with the understanding it is easy to clean. I’m not sure what kind of toddler those people writing those reviews were, but they aren’t my tornado! With only 6 months of use, this thing is impossible to get clean. It doesn’t matter how long I try to scrub and pick at it there will always be food pieces left. Under the direction of customer service I put the cover in my washer. Not only was it hard to get off, I wasn’t able to use the high chair for 2 days waiting for it to fully dry. Save yourself time and money down the road and pick a different high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easily cleanable... despite all the advertising, it’s not user friendly. We like that the tray detaches - that’s the only easy cleaning part. The screws located under the seat, which,’if they could be unscrewed, would allow to take the leather seat completely off, are at impossible angles with the chair that do not allow us to unscrew to clean. I’m tempted to throw it out and get a new one, completely different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare to Clean!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute nightmare to clean. See that “fancy, cozy” seat cover? Yeah, that doesn’t come with 20 minutes of fussing, then an hour to get back on. Not only that it’s got stitching all over it. Guess what happens when a baby grinds on her food for an hour? Yep, it’s permanently embedded into the stitching. See all those “wonderful” adjustment options? Yep, they’re all full of hinges fasteners, and holes. Guess how well oatmeal fits in all of those? Perfectly!! If you enjoy detail cleaning, pulling your hair out, and swearing at your precious baby, this is the chair for you!!
customer_reviews.author: James Brown

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSSIBLE TO CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: IMPOSSIBLE TO CLEAN!! I hate this chair so much. We’ve been using it four or five times a day for about a year and seriously EVERY time I try to clean it I just about lose my mind. There are so many little nooks and crannies and divets and folds and seams for food to get stuck in. The texture of the pad is rough and doesn’t wipe clean easily. Only SOME of the straps come off for deep cleaning. Don’t be fooled by how cool it looks. When you just want to be able to wipe your chair clean for the 700th time you really won’t care what it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: ... was because my 10 month old could not get comfortable in it
customer_reviews.text: very difficult to clean but the main reason I returned it was because my 10 month old could not get comfortable in it. The seat is reclined back so he ends up sliding down and being slouched; not an ideal position for safely eating.
customer_reviews.author: ariane namiranian

customer_reviews.title: Turning mechanism broke, not an easy folding high chair
customer_reviews.text: So after owning this for a year I do not recommend this high chair to anymore. It broke while folding because something inside the high chair was blocking the folding mechanism. I’m extremely mad about this as the video on YouTube and on amazon shows it being easy peasy, absolutely not. it’s cheap and wasn’t meant to be folded with easy, and broke for us.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for very laid back meal time.
customer_reviews.text: Love the portability of this chair and the number of positions the tray will go. Also the removable top tray makes clean up easier. But baby fingers and food still get into every crack and nook. Would rank this chair much higher if the seat back wasn’t quite so laid back. I have to prop my not-so-little little guy up with towels to keep him from looking like he’s in a lounger. The harnessing is intimidating. I know it’s required, but with the piece that comes up between the legs, not really necessary and a huge hassle.
customer_reviews.author: REB

customer_reviews.title: BEST HIGHCHAIR EVER
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble literally took me 1 minute! And it’s so easy to clean, I love how the cover on the tray pops off so you can clean it and snap it back on. Also there are no crevices you need to clean out it’s just simply designed to avoid crumbs and food collecting anywhere. The seat cover... I’m in LOVE. It has a leather effect to it where you can wipe it down and make sure it’s clean. It is such good quality
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Baby Tested, Baby Approved
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this after debating between two other items. Pros: Plastic kid pops off and is easy to clean. Folds up and takes up less space than most other options. Simple colors match easily. Seat cushion quality is good and cleans easily also. Had seat belts to the kid stays locked in. Cons: It’s a SOB to open and close and just forget trying to do it one handed while holding a baby. Nooks and crannies on this make cleaning frustrating at times.
customer_reviews.author: MyNameGoesHere

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This highchair does NOT work for our baby/family. My top complaint is the lack of adjustments. I have a smaller 14 month old (18 pounds). The tray does not come close enough to him and the chair is way too reclined. It is also SUPER difficult to clean. My baby is a messy eater and the cover is almost impossible to remove and get back on. We have had this product for less than a month, and I will get getting rid of it as soon as I find a replacement. I am disappointed because I have heard such great things about the JOOVY brand, but they got it wrong with this high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Drennon

customer_reviews.title: Easily the Best Highchair
customer_reviews.text: I don’t often write reviews but I am so impressed with this product I have to rave about it. I didn’t even need to look at directions because it is so intuitive to collapse and open, and also super easy and can be done one handed. Most importantly, we wanted something that will fit in tight spaces. This folds in half flat and fits under our kitchen table. Plus it’s rubber bottom so it doesn’t slide around and fall over. And the tray is great and easy to wash. Again, I could go on and on. We love this thing and its a life changer.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Erhartic

customer_reviews.title: High Expectations; But Rarely Used...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Folds compactly - Tray can be cleaned relatively easily. Cons: - Bad ergonomics. Our now 10 month old, 21+ pound, ~30 inch tall baby boy doesn't always like sitting in it, as I suspect because he ends up slouching a lot. We've even tried stuffing stuff behind him for support, but it's hit or miss. In either case, he usually motions to me to pick him up... So he often sits on my lap at meal time. Fail. - Be careful when closing the tray. The first time, I closed it right on his fingers. He wasn't very happy.... Poor kid.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Locke

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never felt the need to write a product review before, but y’all. This thing is so hard to clean. I thought the negative reviewers were just being picky but I was wrong and now I see the error of my ways. Plus my baby slouches in it. Don’t do it you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to clean! Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is a nightmare to clean, specially if you let your child feed herself! The food get in between the chair and the cushion, and the cushion is really har to take it off. And the chair has some parts that the food get stuck inside that you have to clean with a toothpick! The chair looks comfortable for the baby and the tray is really good. I just wanted that the cushion would cover more of the chair and that it would come off easy. Really disappointed as it is really hard to maintain clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nanda Vommaro

customer_reviews.title: Cute affordable and trendy
customer_reviews.text: Adorable in person! I ordered black. Great price...... in a sea of high priced (overpriced) high chairs, this stuck out to me for being affordable and fits nicely with home decor! Was pleasantly surprised at how nice it was when I took it out of box. Have never used it for folding tho. Also, for people commenting on the straps and cleaning them....all high chairs have this problem...cheap or expensive. I use Clorox wipes on my high chair, even on the “leather” seat. Looks brand new still. I wish it did have like 360 wheels so it could move better...but would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Rose 🌹

customer_reviews.title: Creases are hard to clean, but it’s good.
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair, I really do. It’s much nicer (and pricier) than the other folding high chairs on the market. I chose this one over the cheaper options because I needed the tray to have a cover that could easily be removed to be cleaned daily, and that it is! However cleaning the creases of the chair is harder than other high chairs I’ve used (reason for 4 stars). It looks very nice, even when it’s dirty, and it folds/unfolds perfectly every single time. Overall, I would recommend this to others, regardless of it being difficult to clean the creases.
customer_reviews.author: MeaganTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: The high chair is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's simple to use and assemble, beautiful, sturdy, and has an awesome swivel open side. People are saying that the straps are tough to clean but heres the workaround: either dont strap the baby in while you're feeling him/her, which is easy to do since you're right there and falling out while they are not strapped in would be difficult. The other workaround is put the bib on the baby after you strap him/her in. That was the perfect solution for me! The bib covers the straps completely. The one thing I didnt like is that the foot rest is way too far below the babys feet, and you cannot adjust that. Otherwise, this highchair rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good chair with good features
customer_reviews.text: We really like these chairs. They’re so easy to put up and down and they store very easily in a closet, which is important when we need two! The side swing tray is awesome. They’re easy to wipe down for the most part, but the stitching and edges do get dirty. The cover can be removed and washed, but it is a pain to get off and back on. Good and bad with this one! Obviously you want something easy to clean with messy babies, but the ease of good and storage and side swing trays are definitely pros.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty high chair. I like that the tray swings out, and it fits at our table nicely. The top tray pops off easily for quick cleaning at the sink. The seat is padded, making it more comfortable for toddler. The legs spread out creating somewhat hazard for footing but it seemed like every one of the high chairs we looked at were that way. Love how it folds up out of the way for storing when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect highchair. I am so glad they make nice modern baby gear now. It is very easy to fold and store if needed. There are so many bad reviews about it being difficult to clean...I don’t get it. How long do those people wait to clean it!!?? I personally clean it everyday. I wipe it down and clean off the straps and seat if they get dirty. I don’t sit my baby in a dirty highchair the next day. Gross. So seriously if you clean it everyday it’s not an issue at all!! It’s so easy I use a Clorox wipe and bam all done.
customer_reviews.author: P. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this Joovy high chair! I also have a Joovy walker with the same style double tray. I bought the turquoise high chair, such a nice bright color. It was already assembled when I pulled it out of the box & so easy to unfold. My grandchild is 1 yr old 30 plus pounds (my little melon ball) & it is a roomy chair. Lightweight & folds up when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a permanent place to set it, it is great. If you have to get it out and put it back for each use, it can be a little awkward because of the wide, long stance of the base. Two positive features of this highchair, are; the padded restraint device that is between the baby's kegs which prevents the child from slipping out from under the the tray, and falling to the floor. The other feature is being able to rotate the tray out and to one side allowing immediate access to the child. Another feature we like (for safety), us the wide, long footprint of the base. It would be extremely hard to tip this chair over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Love the color.
customer_reviews.text: The coral looks more like a rose gold. I love this high chair so much! ! My 6 month old loves it. I love how easy it is to open one side with just one hand. Top tray comes off easily for cleaning. Easy to wipe down the chair . LOVE! Came fast too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Super Mom friendly!
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is super easy to fold up and put away so it isn’t always taking up space! The tray that swivels rather than having to take it out and line the arms back up to get it back it so awesome, it’s so much easier than other high chairs. It’s easy to wipe down or pop the tray insert off and rinse it and is very stylish looking. I also love the piece between the legs as an extra level of security so f the tray would pop out there’s nothing holding them in(since I rarely use the straps ) I just love it !
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: It is worth it with few flaws
customer_reviews.text: I really love this highchair because it’s light weight, easy to fold up, convenient for small space storage and the tray cover is super handy for fast clean up. What I don’t like is that it is very hard to get the fabric off to wash it. I understand that the fabric is wipe clean but food still gets under it from the seat and around where the tray clicks in. It is just very hard to get it completely clean and it is quite frustrating. Other than that I really love the design and how small it folds. You can literally bring it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Blauvelt

customer_reviews.title: Easy, durable, perfect for baby
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic product! High quality for very reasonable price. All I had to do was pull it from the box and unfold it, very easily. Then attach the tray. The tray has a simple squeeze lever that releases the right side to swing open for simple open and close. The fabric is easy to wipe clean. It’s very comfy for baby. Room for baby to gros. Easy storage. I just got mine but my sister has one and I was so impressed. I used mine already today and just couldn’t be more happy and impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Toni K

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: We liked the high chair well enough, despite being difficult to clean. Our son is medically complex and special needs, so we knew we needed something a bit more robust and comfortable figuring he’d be using it for years. Then SURPRISE at only 20 pounds, which is a full 30 pounds below the maximum weight limit, the back snapped while he was in it! Turning this non-reclining chair into a lounger. Thankfully it didn’t drop to the floor, but definitely disappointing when we had only been using it 9 months!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Donahoe

customer_reviews.title: Great folding highchair, the seat fabric does not come apart easy for cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly happy with this highchair. It folds nice and neatly into small spaces and it's very sturdy once opened up. Tray is nice and large, pivots out for easy one-hand use. The only downside is the seat cover does not come apart easily, as it's a very lengthy process to take it off. I've resorted to power spraying it in the shower and only taking the seat off if I have to clean the nook and crannies for stuck-on foods such as cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Mile High Walrus

customer_reviews.title: Two of these broken within a year.  DON'T BUY - DESIGN FLAW
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE READ. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. The two we bought broke all inside of a year. We were optimistic about the first one breaking but when the second chair broke we realized it was a design flaw. Do not buy u less you want a broken chair. Both chairs broke in the exact same spot on both sides of both chairs. Both chairs broke in less than one year. Amazon offered refund but JOOVY wouldn't replace defective chair.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: LOVE HATE THIS CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: I really have a love hate relationship with this chair. I love that it’s sleek & modern. It compliments my kitchen well. It’s easy to hold baby & open close the tray with one hand. I love the removable clear tray but I have yet to wash it in my standard size dishwasher because it doesn’t fit. It’s also easy to fold but I HATE that it’s so difficult to open! & that’s with two hands! I also hate that it’s difficult to truly clean because food gets stuck in all the crevices of the seat & where it attaches to the rest of the high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair!
customer_reviews.text: We've only used the chair twice, but I love it! We love all the features: large tray, swing out tray, adjustable tray and collapsible ability. It's super easy to clean too! The tray and chair cover are easy to wipe off and if necessary, the chair cover is removable. My only concern is that it can't slide on the floor due to the rubbery feet. It's not enough to give it 4 stars, it's just an adjustment from our last chair. It's really light, so I'm not too concerned.
customer_reviews.author: kirkae

customer_reviews.title: Minimal and wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I love the joovy nook highchair. What I love most is the hinged closure so that I never have to line up the plate just so. My son is two and he can literally climb up into the chair (if it's open) and pull the plate towards him and close it. It's minimal in design and function. I just got a coral one for my daughter and it's more of a dusty rose (which is what I wanted). I couldn't say enough good things about the highchair...though the legs do get in the way and it is a trip hazzard. That's why I keep the kids in the corner up against the wall so that nobody will trip.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Isbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Loving this high chair. I like the sleek design and the fact that I can wipe down the entire chair. It's great being able to swing the tray open to put my kid in the seat. He loves it too and will try to climb up into the chair sometimes. The clear part of the tray is detachable making it easy to clean. My only complaint is that you have to completely remove the tray to fold the chair. Once the tray is off, you can almost fold it with one hand. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: very nice & reasonably priced!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is slim & not bulky. It folds very easily & you can open the tray with one hand!!! I have not had to put the chair cover in the washing machine yet, just have been wiping it down. I put a really good bib on mu LO that catches dropped food to minimize mess. It’s very stylish! I have only had it about a month, but am very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Loved
customer_reviews.text: This chair is one of my favorite purchases for my daughter. She absolutely loves to sit in it! When I cook, she sits in it happily and is very comfortable and supported. The tray is so incredibly easy to use and clean. We love that we can take it to our parents’ houses easily because it folds up and does not take up much room in the car. Likewise, it’s easy to put away when we have guests over. My daughter is very secure in the chair with the safe harness when she eats. She loves to sit in it and we couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: This is what you’re looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this high chair. I recommend all of Joovy products to everyone I know! They are on the cheaper side and durable! We have boy girl twins so things that match and aren’t obnoxious are my fav! We have the Joovy spoon walker and love it too! This is East to keep clean if you wipe down each feeding and one handed fold down and flip up. So awesome especially with twins and always holding a baby. Would buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE for My Son!!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Super Easy to Clean 2. Super easy to store and put away 3. Super Light 4. Everything can be done with one Hand which is perfect when holding a baby 5. JUST PURCHASE not gonna lie it looks sleek with some kinda fake leather thats super easy to clean, love that its not bulky will pass down when we are don using and love the Mess tray that it comes with
customer_reviews.author: CEO

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!! Super hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the high chair we use at my mom’s house. We purchased because the price was more reasonable than our main high chair (Oxo Tot Sprout) which we absolutely love! After using this one compared to the Sprout I am kicking myself for not choosing more wisely. The chair is impossible to clean in a timely manner. There are so many holes and creases and gaps that food ends up everywhere. I am looking for something else now because I just can’t deal with how long it takes to clean this chair 3 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this highchair!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy to use this high chair is! No assembly required! This is awesome when you have a toddler there is no time for assembly. It still has plenty of room for him to grow, his feet still don't reach the foot rest. Also love that it can hold 50lbs. He quickly outgrew his previous high chair which was supposed to convert to a booster seat. However it was too narrow and squeezed his thighs so I don't see how it would make a comfortable booster. For reference he is 22months 34 pounds and 3ft.
customer_reviews.author: paige mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought the coral colored Joovy ~3 months ago - it has held up nicely with daily use, that is, it's still CLEAN! My only gripe for a four star is the tray feels so delicate when you swing it open with any sort of weight on it; we feel we have to be overly careful with it so not to mistakenly snap it off or something, else the high chair would be pretty useless. Otherwise, good stuff - glad we didn't get other high chairs that are overly complex and filled with unnecessary features.
customer_reviews.author: Milap Shah

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this high chair multiple times now, and I love it. I do not know why people say it is hard to clean. I just wipe it down after each use. The "crevices" on the tray adjustment are easy to wipe down too. My old high chair was cloth, that was a pain to clean, it absorbed liquid...I love how easy this folds and how small it folds. we can take it with us if needed. The one handed tray opener is a must have. it does not have wheels but I do not mind because it is so light.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really like this chair for our baby girl. Its looks so simple yet has a nice touch of design to our kitchen. Its comfy, perfect height and baby likes to hang out in it while i make her meals. I spend some time trying to find the perfect, prestidge and practical high chair, there were so many i almost got lost with the wide choices. We decided to narrow and simplify our search, by looking for a cutesy yet practical, functional and not to pricey, this was our pick, and so far we are delighted with our pick.
customer_reviews.author: Dariya

customer_reviews.title: Love this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair. I spent SO much time looking for a good high chair.. I’ve read all the reviews for every single one it seems like. I finally ordered this one, and I’m so happy that I did. It is very easy to clean, the coral is so pretty, the removable tray is easy to clean as well, and it is sturdy. I love that I can unlatch one side of the tray and simply open it and close it back in place. Lastly, it folds up with ease, and it smal enough to stow away. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: It does fold small and easily. BUT the legs stick out way way far out from the chair and every member of the family is constantly tripping over this Dang chair. Worse is that there are 100s of tiny little spots for food to get smashed into and it’s imossibke to get clean. I’ve tried toothpicks and even a toothbrush !! Do not. Buy!
customer_reviews.author: AggieBride

customer_reviews.title: Awesome small space high chair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small space high chair. Folds up easily and comes already assembled(besides having to out the tray on). We dont have a "dining room" but a bar in the kitchen and need something that would reach. The counter heigh for our baby and be able to be stored away when not in use. The seat cushion is nice, soft, easy to clean, and easily removable. Definitely recommend especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B.ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Its so hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I gave this chair a try and really wanted it tk work. But its so hard to clean the little tight spaces where my little one manages to dirty with her itty bitty cute fingers. It drove me crazy. It looks good and the pleather is so easy to wipe but not so much where the fabric meets the armrest or the holes that clip onto the tray. That just collects food and you need a knife to drag it out. Might be good for older/calmer kiddos or but not for my squirmy 2 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look no further. This is a really great chair.
customer_reviews.text: This looks and feels like it’s over 200$. I honestly wasn’t expecting this great quality. It comes with like a lid to the tray. Which is a bonus for me since my baby isn’t fully eating solids. She fits perfect in it at 5 1/2 months and she doesn’t sit up on her own. It’s very easy to assemble. Didn’t even look at the instructions. The leather or whatever it is on the seat feels so comfy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlyn sierra

customer_reviews.title: No Assembly Required!
customer_reviews.text: I had my son in law take it out of the box, and it was easy to use. The clear tray was very easy to clean. Also the way the tray opens to the side make it easy to get baby out of chair. I am the grandma, and this chair stays in the guest room with the crib and all the toys so when my grandson comes for visits he has everything needed for a fun visit or stay. I am happy with this purchase. I am not using everyday, but I think it would be great for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: HelloKittyBooBoo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Quality chair with nice material that folds up easily. Really like that the tray can stay attached while taking the baby out. Also the clear tray over the actual tray is quite useful. I almost did not get this chair because of the cleaning reviews but I am glad I did! Once you extend the tray this area is exposed but I don’t see that as a big issue - I will have to clean it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: MrsK

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I loved this high chair until I went to clean it. Although I wiped the chair and straps down frequently it began to stink. I have now washed it six times and it still smells. I have tried everything: oxyclean, vinegar, bleach, different detergents. Nothing works. The worst part is that I can't use the chair without the pad. Obviously whoever designed this chair doesn't have kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I got this after getting annoyed with my summer infant seat that we used as a high chair. It took up one of our chairs and I had to watch out so my baby's fingers wouldn't get pinched. The dog would eat her food when I wasn't looking. NOW WE HAVE NO MORE PROBLEMS! Great quality, easy set up, one handed tray? Yes! And the best thing is that my full sized Goldendoodle won't sneak my baby's food off the tray but I can still have easy clean up with the insert. Worth the $100, looks like an easy wipe down chair. And bonus is that it folds up when we have company over.
customer_reviews.author: Allison E

customer_reviews.title: Daycare provider 37 years, most complete highchair ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate how easily this high chair cleans up. A wet cloth and it’s good to go. No more cloth chair covers that need to be washed often. The swing tray is genious! I take care of my three one year old grandsons so the fact that I can get them secure with one hand is fantastic.i have been a day care provider for 37 years, so impressed I bought three of these chairs! The fold down small and are easy to set up, giving me more space in my kitchen. Only on regret, wish they were available 37 years ago!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb herlofsky

customer_reviews.title: Modern
customer_reviews.text: I am so thankful I found a high chair that works so well for our baby. It’s veey clean and modern. The top part is clear and it comes off so you can wash it after every time your baby eats. The only thing i would change about it is it’s a little low. I HAVE to sit down if I want to feed him without making a mess. I’m only 5’3 and it’s a bit too short. But all in all, good product!
customer_reviews.author: Zlurz on Youtube

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair!! It is simple to use and simple to clean!! The pad is not bulky and simple to wipe clean- even taking it off the chair for a deeper clean is simple. The tray swivels and is not tricky to maneuver. Super easy to get baby in and out. The clear removable tray is great! Nice to be able to click it on and off, rinse and clean. Chair is light weight and easy to transport. Folds down very flat for easy storage. We still use it for our 2.5 year old from time to time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Functional
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my older son’s wooden Eddie Bauer high chair, so I was hesitant getting a “plastic” version. However, I must say I’m pleased. I ended up getting the black version, because I thought it looked sleek. I love the idea that the high chair can be packed away when not in use. It was easy to figure out and not much to “assemble” per se. My only suggestion, would be to make an option that didn’t have trim. Just so less stains would show up. The white tray is enough to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Felecia Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair! Came assembled. I’ve never had something like this that was so easy. You just take it out of the box and it’s ready to go. The tray looks easy to clean and has a clear removable tray covering the actual tray. I think the pad is removable and washable too. To address my rating...As far as durable, it’s plastic and the tray could eventually wear out. Also, there isn’t a lot of versatility, it a high chair. It doesn’t turn into a booster like some etc. but I would still buy this high chair over any other. Very satisfied with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Snapped in half while folding
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say I would have given this product 5 stars as it is the second joovy high chair our family has used but today when folding the chair it got stuck and the back snapped in half and now it is completely unuasable and out for trash day. I am so disappointed. It had been sticking over the past few months both folding and I folding and without too much pressure folding it down the back snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Volchoff

customer_reviews.title: AFTER 6 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of reviews saying hard to clean, what worked for us is wiping down the seat as soon the baby is done eating with soap and water. We love this high chair! Our little girl just turned 6 months old, we wanted something simple, foldable. SO. HARD. TO CLEAN. I've had it almost 6 months now, I COULD TAKE A POWER WASHER TO THIS THING AND IT STILL WOULDN'T CLEAN. IT'S CUTE, BUT I HATE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This chair is a total ROCKSTAR
customer_reviews.text: I got this high chair to replace the horrible Chicco Polly that my husband bought (sorry honey). First of all I love the look. It's modern and the leather look of the seat is stylish. I really bought this because of the swing out tray and it's by far my favorite feature. Don't underestimate the ease of not having to clip in a tray with a fussy toddler. The two improvements they could add to this chair is a recline feature and wheels. But honestly for the price this chair is absolutely amazing and perfect for any first time parents.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Y.

customer_reviews.title: Best high chair
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have 3 kids that means I have purchased 3 different kind of high chairs but this one tops them all when I say the best I mean the BEST. For any parents looking for something with great PRICE and EXCELLENT for the detail go for it. I only do reviews when it's over the top. GET IT YOU WON'T REGRET IT. HAPPY BABY HAPPY PARENTS 🤩🤩🤩
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Folds great, don't like the fabric seat
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this high chair. However all the nooks and crannies of the fabric are perfect for crumbs to hide in and the cleaning requires some elbow grease. The design folds up nicely. We are keeping this one at the grandparents house for occasional use and replaced our daily at home high chair with a Phil&Ted's Poppy high chair because it's so much faster to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MsBark

customer_reviews.title: Honestly can't say enough good about this highchair!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to clean take down and put up! We don't have a huge kitchen so a bulky highchair was out of the question this is an amazing alternative and we just pop it in the camper when we go away for the weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Antonette

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this high chair, with the removable tray that you can wash easily. My only complaint is that the seat itself and side handles have lots of crevices that get food stuck in them. After months of use I had to take it outside and give it a good scrub and hose down and it was good as new again. I like that you can fold it down and store between uses so it doesn’t have to be part of your decor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! The seat itself is soft with a little Cush. It folds nicely and can be tucked away very easily. I have not had a hard time cleaning it, I wipe it down after every use and it has stayed decently clean. I could see where food could be getting stuck but as long as I wipe down after a meal it doesn’t dry and get stuck
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly streamlined but straps are very difficult to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give a 4.5! I did not want a bulky high chair that converts to a million other things, and didn't care about wheels either. It meets my expectations very well - folds away nicely, light but sturdy and very clean-looking. But the straps are very difficult to get to when having to adjust. Since my little one is sitting beautifully by himself and he is not a squirmer in general, the tray holds him in enough to feed him securely so the straps may not come in to play!
customer_reviews.author: Blueiii

customer_reviews.title: Grandma approved high chair
customer_reviews.text: The Nook high chair met all my needs. My 8 month old grandson was visiting for a week and had recently started feeding himself solid foods. The high chair arrived fully assembled except for attaching the tray. The chair unfolded easily and directions for attaching the tray were easy to follow. I liked the ability to swing the tray to the side which made placing my grandson into the chair easy as well as better access to seat for cleaning. Loved the removable tray insert. When I no longer needed to have the chair out, it folded easily for storage. My daughter even approved of the chair above the more expensive high chair she bought for home.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is easy to store away and takes up little space. It’s cute and my kiddo seems comfy in it. It is a huge pain to clean though. There are lots of nooks and crannys where food gets stuck and it’s not easy to remove all the straps. Plus the seat cover isn’t removable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wardle

customer_reviews.title: An affordable buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is ready to go right out of the box. I have a husband who works all the time and last thing he wants to do is assemble something. I love how compact it folds up for storage. I ordered the black and it’s easy to wipe off. Not fabric that you have to wash. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi & David Blake

customer_reviews.title: Pretty highchair, Love that it folds down
customer_reviews.text: Cutest high chair in the cutest coral color! Baby loves it, mama loves it. Love the removable tray makes cleanup a breeze. My favorite part is that is folds down to store away when I’m hosting a party or having company. While it has 2 wheels in the back you have to tilt it backwards to roll across the room (obviously meant to do when baby is not it in) I just wish I could do this with baby in it. But I guess it’s a safety precaution. Still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aracely B.

customer_reviews.title: After purchasing a cheaper high chair and being extremely disappointed, I broke down and got the Joivy Nook
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing a cheaper high chair and being extremely disappointed, I broke down and got the Joivy Nook. You can feel the quality of it just from lifting the box it comes in. It is so sturdy, easily compactable, and worth every penny. I love how the seat just wipes clean, the tray liner for easily cleaning, and how the tray swivels so you don’t have to take it off to get your child in and out. Wish I had gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Tim & Riss Patnode

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with my decision to choose this highchair. Easy to clean, beyond convenient folding capability that works great for our small kitchen, and the one-sided swinging open/close function is also super convenient. I'd say the only frustration are the harness straps; they're tight and not easy to adjust. Otherwise, this is simply a great product, especially compared to its more expensive competitors. After 4 months of use, it is holding up very well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Lass

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, Comfortable, and Folds up thin!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave enough about this chair! We originally purchased a graco one that was very uncomfortable for our son to be in. Then we got this and I have to say it’s the best high chair out there! Super easy to clean, comfortable for the baby, and folds up nice and slim for closet storage. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah L.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, baby sits nicely, but horrendous to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. I wish I had listened to reviews, but I thought I'd be able to keep it clean because I'm a clean freak. Oh how wrong I was. This thing is TERRIBLE to keep clean. I'm seriously considering dumping it and losing my money after a couple of weeks use. I can't see how I can keep it safe and hygienic for my little one. Such a shame as the design is lovely, and the little one sits with a good posture and seems to be very comfortable. Swing tray is also great. Overall, a disappointment and a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect High Chair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this high chair. It is sturdy, low profile, and a sleek modern design. The vegan leather is easy to clean as well as the tray which comes with a removable cover. Being collapsible is a plus for my small living space too. There isn’t any assembly and is ready to pop open right out of the box. The best thing about it is that it’s affordable and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: I like this chair.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It’s pretty and so far working well for us. I love the fold away part. I don’t have to look at the chair all day after my kid has ate. It’s small, not gigantic like some other chairs. I would buy again and recommend. Not sure how the cleaning part will go, but it does not seem like it can go in the washing machine. Spot clean only.
customer_reviews.author: starfish138

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would've just gotten the $20 ikea chair. This chair is a pain in the ass to clean, and my baby doesn't quite sit up straight in it because the chair leans back slightly. It folds very easily though and is always great when we travel to grandma's house because it's pretty compact. Your baby will spend a lot of time in their chair, the last thing you want to do is spend so much time cleaning it when it's going to get dirty 3x a day, every day. Either splurge for the stokke or just get the ikea.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: I love this high chair! So convenient
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is awesome! Not only is it beautiful, but it folds easily to store anywhere! I take this with to restaurants family get togethers, everything! My daughter used this from 5 months + and is now 8 months and it’s one of the best purchases I’ve made!! Every time I flip the little tab to open it up I feel so great about it. I can easily hold my baby and open or close the high chair or carry it with the other hand. Definitely definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: ✌️

customer_reviews.title: Simple, stylish, smart
customer_reviews.text: This is the first high chair I’ve used since the wooden one my little sister had so not much to compare it to, but I love it! It is easy to clean with the removable clear tray. Not gonna lie, I bought it because of the way it looks. Very sleek and clean. We have the Joovy walker, too. We love it, and so does our little girl. I’d say Joovy has it figured out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS HIGH CHAIR!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS HIGH CHAIR!! I cannot stress that enough! It is so sleek looking, SO easy to fold and unfold (my husband can do it with one hand as he has a cast on), and so easy to travel with. It folds down so compact and when it’s in use or sitting out, it is slim and doesn’t seem like it’s taking up the whole space you’re in. We fold it up and bring it with us when going to friends/families houses for dinner. Trust me- just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small spaces, nice design
customer_reviews.text: The high chair arrived fully assembled, which was really nice. The faux leather makes cleaning a breeze and it’s a very sleek, low-key looking item. I do have to use two hands to fold/unfold it which is a little inconvenient at times but since I live in a smaller space it’s so nice that it folds up so glad and I can just stick it in the corner and it’s not in the way of anything. I love this chair and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonP

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! Just missing one thing.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair. It’s clean and attractive unlike some other prints. Easy to clean and fold. Best feature is the swing away tray! So easy to put my child in and out. One thing I desperately wish this chair had is some wheels. I can deal with no height adjustments or recline as babies can outgrow those features when you need a simple chair. However, there have been many times I wish I could easily roll my child from kitchen to dining room for our family meal. Otherwise, we love this chair! Getting a second for our upcoming baby!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Better than the bigger brands
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair. It’s good quality and is compact when folded. It’s sleek and modern looking and goes with the decor in my home. I have a Graco highchair that does it all and I HATE it compared to the Joovy. Not to mention, you can’t beat the price! The tray swings out instead of pulling off and the chair feels like it’s made of leather (obviously it’s not real) I would recommend this highchair to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to fold up between uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a second home with limited space. Super easy to fold up between uses. I love the clip out tray for cleaning. Looks very stylish as well. The seat material is easy to wipe down, but I do wish there was an option for a fabric that is machine washable. My son is 10 mo and the straps are almost all the way tight. This will be a great seat for now and as he gets bigger but it may be big for a 6mo old depending on size. I didn't have it at that age. Overall, I definitely recommend this if you're looking for style, convenience and space saving.
customer_reviews.author: KTS1981

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Bought for all the features and storage abilities. It lives up to those claims. My single tiny suggestion would be to make the tray slide on a bit easier. Sometimes I feel like I miss the track and it takes a second to get it lined up to click. Love how easy the seat is to clean. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair and good looking, too.
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair and sturdy, comfortable, and attractive. I am the grandma and had originally purchased a cheaper brand high chair but it was difficult to get my granddaughter in and out and it had other issues. It is worth paying more if you can afford it. This is a super chair for my two granddaughters, one under age one and one almost three.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jersey Shore

customer_reviews.title: It won’t regret
customer_reviews.text: I had this high chair for over a month now. Before I had another cheaper high chair and compared to that Joovy is amazing! It is heavy enough that it doesn’t move when I pick up my child. It is comfortable for my baby and the tray is full-size and I can put lots of things there. Overall, I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but it’s impossible to clean. So many little cracks that you can’t get to, really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MHill

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean but great to fold
customer_reviews.text: I love how this folds and the swinging tray is a nice feature. The look of it also isn't bad. This is a bear to clean though. It is called the Nook and there are plenty of nooks for food to get into. The clear tray also doesn't come over the lip of the tray so while you can pop it off and put it in the dishwasher, you still have to clean the tray beneath it. I also feel that there is no way to keep my baby from slouching down while being close enough to the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!!! Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this high chair. It is easy to clean and fold and assemble!! It looks great in my kitchen! And works great for my grandson. We even took it on our first outing and it was great!! The fabric is wipeable and very durable. The tray has a clear removable cover on it for super easy cleaning. My son and daughter in law love it too and now they want one. Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie West

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to clean as suggested.
customer_reviews.text: The seat cover is not as easy to remove and reattach as the listing makes it seem. It is a pain in the butt. While the seat is pretty simple to wipe down, it definitely needs cleaned in the washing machine at least monthly with the amount of food that gets wiped all over it. Also, with the legs extended out, it takes up a lot of room. So unless you want to fold it up and put it away and then take it out only a few hours later, plan to have a decently sized space available for storage.
customer_reviews.author: mraypole86

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Seat is easy to assembly and looks clean. I like the idea that the top plastic can be removed for cleaning. Leather looks good and comfort. Only issue is the fact the it takes some space when opened but that is not big issue to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mckiito

customer_reviews.title: Every parent should have a Joovy Nook highchair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair! I love Joovy! I love Amazon warehouse deals! This chair is like the Mercedes of highchairs! The seat is so soft and easy to clean. We love the swing out tray and the pop off tray cover! I wish I had the money to buy 5 of these for our daycare ladies. It is so much easier to use than a regular highchair and at half the price! It was a warehouse deal and on perfectly new condition!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair. It is very simple to use and easy to keep clean. I like the bar that keeps them from slipping under. The tray has a nice plastic cover that is so easy to pop off and clean. I also like how the tray swings to the side. It is much easier than holding a kid in the chair while trying to put on the tray and not smash their fingers!!
customer_reviews.author: Retirednhappy

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter loves this chair.
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by another mom. Our daughter was a preemie so she continues to be smaller for her age. She fits well in the chair and enjoys being it in. Easy to clean even by spraying the chair down and letting it dry or the vaccum to get up crumbs. I am able to fold and unfold the chair was one hand. Once folded it is very compact and stand on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Joovy highchair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he absolutely loves sitting in it. It's very easy to clean, and fold up if you need to move it out of the way. The tray stays attached and easily moves out of the way to place the child in or take the child out. I think you will love this highchair as much as we do.
customer_reviews.author: poorme 4

customer_reviews.title: One hand open feature is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our second child because I hated the Graco high chair we had for our first. The one hand open feature is my favorite thing. I didn’t realize how handy that would be but it’s so much easier when you’ve got a baby in your arms. And the tray liner makes cleaning a breeze compared to removing the whole tray with my old one. The only negative is it’s hard to move around so I wish it had wheels. But overall I love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Convenient high chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It is convenient to fold and store or take in the car for a visit. Tray has a nice mechanism that allows it to slide away from baby and over to the left side. You can unbuckle and remove your child without removing the tray. Height of straps adjust when baby gets older and bigger. Great for grandmas house too. The one negative is the feet have a large footprint but that also makes it more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Stoler

customer_reviews.title: Great chair especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought a pretty expensive wooden high chair for my first born and when we found out we were having another child, opted for something cheaper. This chair is really great, I like it even more than the one that we paid more for. I love the swivel tray, it makes putting my daughter in it really easy. This chair seems pretty comfortable for her too. You have to put a vacuum to it once in awhile to get the crumbs out of the crevices but all in all, we are really happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 kids. This highchair has been our favorite by far and we've had many chairs. Easy to clean with the gray material and it's easy to get the stitching clean, that's the hardest part. It folds so compactly that we take it to dinner parties and social gatherings. It folds in half, not just the legs, completely in half. It's easier to bring along then one of those booster things you attach to a dining chair. Very impressed with the design and the quality too. - happy momma
customer_reviews.author: H.A

customer_reviews.title: Cool that it folds, but that’s it
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can fold and put this high chair away. However that’s all I love about it. It’s a pain to clean, there are more nooks and crannies then other chairs. The chair only allows for the child to be seated slightly leaned back, just enough for my son to hate it. Wouldn’t keep it but I’m past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: LK

product_meta.title: JOOVY Nook High Chair, Charcoal
product_meta.description: Color:Charcoal| Style:RegularSay hello to a new tradition in high chairs. High chair trays are hard to use. The Nook uses a swing-open tray to simplify mealtime. This fantastic high chair features a large swing-open tray that operates with one-hand. Without having to use two hands or line up cumbersome rails, mom or dad can easily hold their child while operating the tray. There is no need to remove dishes from the tray before taking the child out of the chair. Simply swing the tray open, unbuckle your child and off you go to the next task. This feature helps keep you kitchen counter clear. Folding and storing the high chair in the pantry or kitchen nook will make your kitchen feel more spacious. High chairs have gotten bulkier and less kitchen friendly. With the Nook's ability to fold like a beach chair, it opens up new opportunities for use at picnics, camping, friend's homes, and at grandparents. Bringing the baby to meals anywhere has never been easier. We know how important it is to parents to have tray adjustability. Keeping food on the tray and off the child's lap is essential. The new Nook has a tray with four depth adjustments to accommodate your child as they grow. Many high chairs lack a big enough seat. The Nook is a roomy, full-size high chair with an exceptional padded leatherette seat that accommodates a child up to 50 lbs. The leatherette material makes it is easy to wipe down. The Nook comes fully assembled and is ready to go, out of the box.
feature_bullets: Removable swing open tray with 4 adjustable positions
Easy clean-up, dishwasher-safe tray insert and leatherette seat wipes down easily
Compact, one-hand, standing fold with carry handle
Non-scratch floor pads. BPA/BPS/phthalate/lead free. No flame retardants
Adjustable 5-point harness, max child weight 50 pounds ; Tray width: 21” ; Folded dimensions: 9” H x 23.5” W x 28.5” L

specifications.Care instructions: Easy clean-up, dishwasher-safe tray insert and leatherette seat wipes down easily
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,283 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
